Text: Try Ananovacom for much coverage of todays terrorist incidentsRuben S Brown writes to the NYISOTECHEXCHANGE Discussion List Subject Try Ananovacom for much coverage of todays terrorist incidents Sorry to impose on this list server but many of us are involved in todays events The following may be helpful and of interest to some of you My son Ruben E Brown a computer maven at Incert Technology that some of you know from NYISO meetings this Spring has steered me to the Ananovacom website which has high powered servers covering the Terrorist situation with still relatively few hits It is constantly feeding AP coverage and is updated much faster than the conventional US sites Times are London times RS End of Forwarded Message Ruben S Brown MALD President The E Cubed Company LLC East th Street New York NY fax cell
